speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Mr Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. Honestly, and I can't be any truer than this, all I wanted was for the Milwaukee Buck Bucks to be down one point once there were all zeroes on the board, he said.
